completeness and accuracy for compliance Facilitated Security Control Assessment SCA and Continuous Monitoring Activities Executed examine interview and test procedures in accordance with NIST SP 80053A Revision 4 Ensured cyber security policies are adhered to and that required controls are implemented Validated information system security plans to ensure NIST control requirements are met Developed resultant SCA documentation including but not limited to the Security Assessment Report SAR Authored recommendations associated with findings on how to improve the customers security posture in accordance with NIST controls Assisted team members with proper artifact collection and detail to clients examples of artifacts that will satisfy assessment requirements Updated and reviewed AA requirements and not ambiguous statements Managed vulnerabilities with the aid of Nessus vulnerability Scanners to detect potential risks on single or multiple assets across the enterprise network Reviewed SAR post assessment created and completed POAMs milestones to remediate findings and vulnerabilities Monitored security controls post authorization to ensure continuous compliance with the
